description:
This is not an "all you can eat" course, but rather a "gourmet" course, a short course on very specialized subject with only premium content. The course is about building the right mindset to start an Etsy shop. It is not a tutorial basic details on how to set up a shop, but more about finding your right reason in every aspect of the process. The content of the course will be full with INSIDER tips and tricks, do and dont's, with a hint of trade secrets. You will be having my shop as your case study and I will take you to a lot of tours inside Etsy.

At the end of the course, when you are ready to open your shop, you will get your personalized first shop critique to make sure that you start with the right foot. You will also be invited to a fall back support group to be with you on your "selling on Etsy" journey.
title: How to Start Building a Sustainable Shop on ETSY.
